team_description: A passionate team that constantly pushes the boundaries of innovation to create exceptional Discord experiences
icare_description: Expert in advanced technical solutions and infrastructure management. Responsible for all bot development and the website.
sparkot_description: Guarantor of the global vision and ecosystem development. Responsible for marketing strategy and partnerships.
flagship_description: An innovative solution that revolutionizes how Discord communities monetize
discorads_description: A comprehensive platform enabling Discord server owners to monetize their community and advertisers to precisely target their ideal audience.
monetization_desc: Generate passive income by displaying targeted ads on your Discord server
targeting_desc: Reach exactly the communities that match your audience
analytics_desc: Track your campaign performance with detailed real-time statistics
security_desc: Total control over displayed ads to preserve the integrity of your community
team_available: Our team is available to answer your questions and assist you with your Discord projects

icare_modal_desc1: Responsible for all bot development and the website. Expert in advanced technical solutions and infrastructure management. Passionate about creating innovative tools to improve user experience on Discord.
icare_modal_desc2: With deep expertise in the Discord.js API, I build comprehensive and high-performance solutions that meet the needs of communities.
sparkot_modal_desc1: Responsible for project strategy, communication, and partnerships. Guarantor of the global vision and ecosystem development. Sparkot brings expertise in digital marketing and business development to grow the community.
sparkot_modal_desc2: In close collaboration with developers and clients, he continuously defines and refines the user experience to ensure that our solutions perfectly meet the needs of Discord communities.
discorads_modal_description: An innovative platform that allows Discord servers to monetize while offering advertisers an effective way to reach their audience.
server_owners_desc: Earn money by displaying targeted ads on your Discord server. Our platform allows you to monetize your community while maintaining control over the ads displayed.
advertisers_desc: Gain visibility with active and engaged communities. Our targeting tools allow you to precisely reach your ideal audience on Discord.
budget_control: Total control of budget and bids
registration_desc: Create an account and configure your profile according to your specific needs
configuration_desc: Set your broadcast or targeting preferences according to your role
growth_desc: Track your results and continuously optimize your strategies
